org.apache.flex.swc

Interface ISWCScript

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SWCScript

    public interface ISWCScript
    Model for <script> entry in a SWC catagory.xml file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDefinition(String def)
      Add a definition to the script.
      void addDependency(String name, DependencyType type)
      Add a dependency to the script.
      Set<String> getDefinitions()
      Get a list of QNames declared in the <def> tags.
      com.google.common.collect.SetMultimap<String,DependencyType> getDependencies()
      Get a map of dependencies and their dependency types.
      long getLastModified()
      Get the last modified time-stamp of the script.
      String getName()
      Get the name of the script.
      String getSignatureChecksum()
      Get signature checksum.
      byte[] getSource()
      Get the ABC byte code of the script.
      void setSource(byte[] abcData)
      Attach the ABC byte code to the script.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the name of the script. The name maps to the DoABC tag name in the library SWF file.
        Returns:
        script name

      • getLastModified

        long getLastModified()
        Get the last modified time-stamp of the script.
        Returns:
        last modified

      • getSignatureChecksum

        String getSignatureChecksum()
        Get signature checksum.
        Returns:
        signature checksum

      • getDefinitions

        Set<String> getDefinitions()
        Get a list of QNames declared in the <def> tags.
        Returns:
        definition QName list

      • getDependencies

        com.google.common.collect.SetMultimap<String,DependencyType> getDependencies()
        Get a map of dependencies and their dependency types.
        Returns:
        dependencies

      • addDefinition

        void addDefinition(String def)
        Add a definition to the script.
        Parameters:
        def - name of the definition

      • addDependency

        void addDependency(String name,
                 DependencyType type)
        Add a dependency to the script.
        Parameters:
        name - QName of the dependency
        type - type of dependency

      • setSource

        void setSource(byte[] abcData)
        Attach the ABC byte code to the script.
        Parameters:
        abcData - ABC byte code

      • getSource

        byte[] getSource()
        Get the ABC byte code of the script.
        Returns:
        ABC data
